customer_name: Ayers Legends German Shepherds L L C
site_name: AYERS LEGENDS GERMAN SHEPHERDS L L C
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This is the 1st pre license inspection for a Class A license.
Conducting regulated activity without a USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Identification and record keeping requirements were explained to the applicant.   
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
